displayName: Ensure that logging is enabled for Cloud storage buckets
rationale: By enabling access and storage logs on target Storage buckets, it is possible to capture all events which may affect objects within target buckets. Configuring logs to be placed in a separate bucket allows access to log information which can be useful in security and incident response workflows.
recommended_action:
Using Gsutils:
To set Storage Access Logs and Storage logs for a bucket run:
gsutil logging set on -b gs://<bucketName for a bucket used to store logs>
gs://<your bucket name>
error_message: Cloud storage buckets has logging disabled
